data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 SE 8.1
data.actual_result: Any options that was out of screen will get cut off or not reappear even if you collapsed the menu unless you reopen the menu
data.short_description: On small screens with a short height, accessing a large message menu, expanding it, then pulling it back down makes options disappear or get cut off until you open it again
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a small screen, you can mimic this with landscape mode - To get best results have manage messages, add reactions permissions and developer mode on so you get the max 8 message options - Hold on a message - Expand it - Pull it back down
